title: Endless Love
short_cast: Alex Pettyfer, Gabriella Wilde, Bruce Greenwood, Joely Richardson, Robert Patrick, Rhys Wakefield, Dayo Okeniyi, Emma Rigby, Anna Enger, Fabianne Therese

desc: In this remake of the 1981 cult classic, the incendiary first love affair between two teens grows obsessive when their parents try to separate them.
